an5.129:1.1: “Mendicants, these five fatal wounds lead to a place of loss, to hell.
an5.129:1.3: Murdering your mother or father or a perfected one; maliciously shedding the blood of a Realized One; and causing a schism in the Saṅgha.
an5.129:1.4: These five fatal wounds lead to a place of loss, to hell.”
